text: Joyce Brothers (October 20, 1927 - May 13, 2013)Some sources indicate 1928 as her year of birth. An official document (though not a birth certificate) in her personal papers held at Cornell University indicates that her birth date is October 20, 1927. was an American television personality and actress. She has been on many TV programs. These include The Nanny, Melrose Place and Frasier. She is also a newspaper columnist. Many date of birth related sources say 1927 is her birth year while others claim 1928 or 1929, was her birth year. Brothers died on May 13, 2013 in Fort Lee, New Jersey from respiratory failure, aged 85.Associated Press. Popular psychologist Joyce Brothers has died in New York at age 85..
